source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_00<tab>The world may know 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu as a lazy bag of bones, but you know the truth: few are as industrious when it comes to foiling a hated rival's plans.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のクラフトマン789 ボ・グは、邪魔をしたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_01<tab>Intent on frustrating the ambitious Zo Ga, 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu has concocted a plot to halt the planned upgrades to the 13th Order's prototype furnace. Since the plot is of a flammable nature─as is Bo Gu's wont─you will need to consult the bombsmith Ba Go on the best way to incinerate Zo Ga's wain full of upgrade parts.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_01<tab>クラフトマン789 ボ・グは、フューグルマン13 ゾ・ガたちが行う新造錬金釜の調整を邪魔したいらしい。彼らが運び込んだ「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93AA01 /var>」を焼き払うため、第789洞穴団の採掘地の「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」と相談しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_02<tab>Ba Go is as helpful as he is raving mad─that is to say, exceedingly so. The first thing is to mark the wain with bright coal. The alchemist Ga Zi will serve as your guide into the 13th Order workshop.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_02<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴに相談すると、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897B01 /var>で部品を焼き払う方法を教えてくれた。まずは、第13洞穴団の錬金工房にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93AA01 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897A01 /var>」を設置しよう。第13洞穴団の錬金工房へは、アイアンレイクにいる「アルケミスト13 ガ・ジ」が案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_03<tab>The alchemy wain looks quite festive with the bright coal, though not quite the fair figure of Ba Go's fevered imaginings. Release the advanced smart bombs from a safe location nearby, and let the fireworks begin.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93AA01 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897A01 /var>を設置した。付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93B001 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897B01 /var>」を設置し、爆発させよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_04<tab>The wain and its contents are thoroughly crisped; whatever Ba Go lacks in sanity, he makes up for in his knowledge of explosives. If you do not wish to share the wain's fate, obey the Acolyte's wishes and find the bomb core among the embers, subduing the still-active bomb.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897B01 /var>で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93AA01 /var>を焼き払った。付近に飛び散った「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93B101 /var>」を調べ、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20ABA01 /var>」を討伐して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897C01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_05<tab>The advanced smart bomb is no more. You are the proud guardian of a smart bomb core, and it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a beauty. You are beginning to understand something of what Ba Go sees in these things. Suppress a momentary pang and hand over the core to Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20ABA01 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897C01 /var>を入手した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897C01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_06<tab>In Ba Go's twitchy-yet-capable hands, the core will be reborn as a brand-new bomb. Your part in this glorious cycle of life complete, return to the 789th Order Dig and make your report to Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_06<tab>新しい爆弾の材料となる<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897C01 /var>を、アコライト789 バ・ゴに渡した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「クラフトマン789 ボ・グ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_07<tab>With the wain full of parts up in smoke, Zo Ga will not be upgrading his furnace for some time. Bo Gu is overjoyed at the success of the plot, and looks at you with new respect─or something that passes for it among his ilk.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SEQ_07<tab>新造錬金釜の調整を邪魔したことを、クラフトマン789 ボ・グに報告した。作戦が成功したことでクラフトマン789 ボ・グは自信を持ったようだ。第789洞穴団が更なる自信と向上心を持ってくれるよう、彼らに協力を続けよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_00<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴと話す

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_01<tab>Place bright coal on the alchemy wain in the 13th Order workshop.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_01第13洞穴団の錬金工房にあるに
を設置

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_02<tab>Release the advanced smart bombs from a safe location.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93B001 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897B01 /var>を設置し爆発させる

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_03<tab>Overcome any and all obstacles to rummage through the embers and retrieve an advanced smart bomb core.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_03<tab>妨害を退け<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93B101 /var>を調べて<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20ABA01 /var>から心核を入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_04<tab>Hand the advanced smart bomb core to 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_04<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_05<tab>Report to 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_TODO_05<tab>クラフトマン789 ボ・グに報告する

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_000<tab>That Zo Ga is at it again! Upgrading the prototype furnace I heard, yes, upgrading─tweaking, improving, upgrading. A nice day I was having, a warm worm of a day it was, and now it's gone sour─tart, curdled, sour!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_000冒険者どーの　イチダイジですーぞ！
ゾ・ガたちーが　「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」にあーる
「新造錬金釜」を　調整しようとしているらしいですーぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_001<tab>Oh, this is absolutely intolerable, unbearable to the honor of Bo Gu and his comrades. Zo Ga boasts he has forgotten more about efficiency than other orders remember, yes, yes! The braggart admits he is senile─past it, gaga, senile!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_001「新造錬金釜」を作っただけでなーく
マジメに調整しーて　性能上げようとするなんーて！
おのれゾ・ガめ　卑怯なまねーを！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_002<tab>Doddering Zo Ga's advantage is most unfair─unjust, unmerited, unfair! The adventurer must correct this rank inequity in the most expedient way, by blowing the 13th's alchemy wain sky-high!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_002ゾ・ガたちーが　働けば働くほーど
ソレガシたちの不真面目さーが　目立ってしまいますーぞ！
どうにーか　「」を　爆破しなけれーば！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_003<tab>Such a course is expedient and wise, for a certain someone cannot go long without a good kabloom, no, no. The adventurer will seek the help of 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go, Ba Go will assist and sate his appetite for destruction, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_003この手の破壊活動なーら
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」氏の協力が　必要ふかけーつ……
冒険者どーの　バ・ゴ氏に話してきてくださーれ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_004<tab>789th Order Acolyte Ba Go will help, Ba Go enjoys blowing things sky-high, yes, yes. Perhaps too much─excessive, inordinate, too much...but the adventurer will make no mention of this, no, no!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_004この手の破壊活動なーら
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」氏の協力が　必要ふかけーつ……
冒険者どーの　バ・ゴ氏に話してきてくださーれ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_010<tab>Bo Gu sent you, yes? Bo Gu is afraid Ba Go will have one of his little spells soon. An alchemy wain, you say? Which beauties will dance in that ball, Ba Go wonders─muses, mulls, wonders. Aha! The smart bombs, the advanced smart bombs! Haha! Heeheahhahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_010ククク……「」を　爆破したいだーって？
それなーら　この「」を　使うといいーね。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_011<tab>Three bright coals to mark the wain, make a handsome prince of the unlovely drudge. Ba Go's little beauties will rush to him, plant on him their fiery kisses─frenzied, ardent, fiery. Haha! Heeheahhahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_011「」を　目標に使えーば
「」ちゃん　まっしぐーら！
火力はボクちゃん　お墨付きーよ……ククク……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_012<tab>You'll check the embers afterwards, though the beauties will be angry─fuming, seething, angry. A bomb core you must retrieve─Ba Go will not have his beauties seen in dishabille, no, no.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_012ただーし　使い終わったーら　「」調べるーよ。
猛り狂った「」がいるかーら
やっつけーて　「」回収するこーと。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_013<tab>You want to get into the 13th Order workshop, sneak in without cutting and flaying? Ga Zi will let you in, yes, yes. He has his reasons, does Ga Zi. Haha! Heeheahha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_013「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」に　行きたいでーしょ？
それなーら　「アルケミスト13 ガ・ジ」のところだーね。
チミ　今なら顔パスだーよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_014<tab>Take the smart bombs to the ball, yes, yes. Only one dance though, then you must go among the embers and bring home a bomb core. She will pout, for too long has she stayed home, but you know what to do with wayward beauties...haha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_014「」ちゃんを　使うのーよ。
「」に「」寄ってくーる。
それを倒しーて　「」を回収しーて。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_020<tab>Did my beauties enjoy the ball? Did the prince dance with them? Did he burn─blackening, twisting? I smell screams. Heeheahhahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_020ククク……おかえーり。
ボクちゃんの爆弾ちゃん　役に立ったようだーね？

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_021<tab>Look at her, a babe in arms again. Ba Go will take good care of his beauty, nurse and bathe and feed her he will. Make new beauty of her─fresh, terrible, new!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_021ククク……ちゃんと心核も回収したんだーね。
よちよーち　もっとスゴイ火力の爆弾ちゃんに
育て直してあげるからーね……ククク……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_022<tab>Good of you to escort my beauty home, yes, yes. You are wanted by Craftsman Bo Gu, your report he will want to hear. Much kaboom there was. Heeheahhaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BAGO_000_022さーあ　チミが戻ってくるーの
「クラフトマン789 ボ・グ」が待ってるーよ？

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_030<tab>Just deserts, deserved and delivered! May Zo Ga singe his arse on what's left of the wain, yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_030まったーく、ざまぁみろですーな！
ゾ・ガたちなーど　せいぜい慌てふためけばいいのですーぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_031<tab>The adventurer is a friend to the 789th, the right kind of diligence and disregard for others' property has <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>. Together we shall go far─the distance, all the way, far. This I must think deeply on, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BOGU_000_031感謝しますーぞ　冒険者どーの！
冒険者どーのの力と　ソレガシの作戦……
その両方が合わされーば　ゾ・ガなど恐るるに足りませんーな！
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SCENE00018_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」へ入りますか？
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SCENE00030_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」へ入りますか？
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_SCENE00060_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」へ入りますか？

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>The embers are suddenly alive with danger!
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_040<tab>(-13th Order Watchman-)This is Zo Ga's workshop, you ain't Zo Ga, no, no. So it follows, someone who ain't Zo Ga's got no business here!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_040(-13オーダー・ウォッチマン-)おうおーう　なんーだ　てめぇーはっ！
ここはゾ・ガさんの錬金工房だ　勝手に入るんじゃーねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_041<tab>(-13th Order Watchman-)Here now, where did you come from anyway? Seems to me this is an inside job─black treachery, dissension in the ranks, an inside job!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_041(-13オーダー・ウォッチマン-)なんーで　こんなとーこに　ヒトがいーる！？
さっさと出てかねぇーと　ブッころーす！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_042<tab>(-13th Order Watchman-)Intruder, yes, yes! None who breach the 13th Order Dig shall live to tell, no, no!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_KOBOLD01341_000_042(-13オーダー・ウォッチマン-)シンニュウシャーめ！
オレたち「第13洞穴団」に　刃向かうヤツは　容赦しなーい！

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BALLOON_000_050<tab>Our alchemy wain! You'll die for this─drop, croak, die!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_BALLOON_000_050よくーも！
やってくれたーな！
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_POPMESSAGE_000_002<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません

source: TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_GAJI_000_060<tab>Yunz want to muck up the 13th's workshop? Can hardly say no, seeing as how I's done my share of gumming up the works there. Go on through, yunz got to do what yunz got to do, uh-huh, uh-huh.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB207_01341_GAJI_000_060「第13洞穴団の錬金工房」　行きたいんだーって？
いいーよいいーよ　通って通ってー。
